title: Petition to bring back team builder
body:
Ok, so the new system is honestly really bad, it's great for ranked and blind pick, but a lot of people want to learn how to play a certain champion against other people. For example, i want to learn how to play nasus top lane. well, i have to hope i get top lane or i won't get to learn him, which means i have to choose a champion that I know how to play w/e lane I choose second. I don't think hardly anyone is happy with the new system. If we had a premade team then it might of been different because we have our set spots. but when you're doing solo que, then there is an issue with getting the spot you want. 

It was fun while it lasted, but it's time to bring back team builder. 

+1 vote for bring it back.

replies.body:
It would be amazing... At first I thought I could go without Team Builder. Boy was I wrong lol

The reason I loved it was because it took so much stress out of the champ select process, you could select someone, are guaranteed the lane and role you want, and you always met some of the friendliest people
You also don't have the stipulation of counter picks whatsoever since no one can see your champ til loading screen.

it's not counter picks, it's the 100% ban rate of any new or reworked champion for over a week, because "it's op and your not first pick" or "i wanted it your higher pick, sucks for you" mentality, how can i practice something in a non-ranked environment if it's 100% banned, try and play click race in normals and hope my competition doesn't troll or quit? no thank you...  I don't mind counter picks, that's life, but mirrors are just dumb, it will never be the case in a real match of any kind.

Stop arbitarily limiting my gameplay choices.  **BRING BACK TEAM BUILDER.**

TB allowed me to avoid this almost entirely, and since it was shut down LOL has been a poor experience for me. Agreed, mostly. The new draft pick is a sound system for it's purpose. Team builder has a different purpose. I used to be able to play two games of an evening, taking usually around 90-120 mins. That time has been easily pushed out to minimum 120 minutes, and last night I was on for 150 mins for two games. They were admittedly long games, but the champ select takes sooo long to get started typically because people don't pass the AFK check, and then someone forgets to lock in their pick and we have to do the whole thing over again! 

Team builder avoided all these problems; it's only downside was that at times you would have the same champs selected on both teams but that was a small price to pay for a prompt start. 

Bring back team builder. I has a purpose that draft pick doesn't meet!

Me and my friends almost only played Team Builder.  Getting to play who you want, where you wanted was how things should be!  Some people complain about the wait times, but what people fail to realize is that's okay.  If you want to play mid Sona and you are willing to wait to get a team as that, then feel free!  But it's not the same with the new draft.  I like the new system, but Team Builder was a completely different queue that catered towards a large group of people who just wanted to play who they wanted for fun, or practice.  So Riot, PLEASE bring it back.  T__T <3
